name: The Potion Cellar - Ludum Dare 49
description:
Inspired by:

Summary:

The Potion Cellar is a small potion shop in some unnamed medieval city. You must work with unstable ingredients to make potions for your clients. Play the mini games for each tool, being careful not to ruin the unstable ingredients. 

Directions:

Click and drag tools to the middle of the table to use them.  As customers make their order you can pick ones to make from the order list on the top left.  You need to make enough money to cover your daily costs.

Credits: 

Music:  DanteEXE

Art & Code:  Mactinite
